title: Vantana
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Macrobiotic, Organic, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A 100% macrobiotic modern restaurant with an art gallery. Has an extensive array of uniquely creative vegan dishes cooked with organic grains and vegetables. A large space in a comfortable atmosphere. As of Nov 2014, does not have Wi-Fi.
